overview:
Aaron Bodiya, co-founder and President of JusCollege, Inc., is responsible for managing the human and financial aspects of JusCollege, Inc.

Aaron strategically acquires talent that the organization needs and ensures that all new employees smoothly transition into the company through various training efforts, alignment to business objectives, and alignment with new managers. Â  Aaron alsoÂ oversees JusCollege’s business model by providing in-depth analyses of all financial data for both the short and long-term growth of the company. By determining the most cost-effective initiatives and business opportunities, Aaron helps ensure a healthy portfolio for the business, and in turn for investors.
